name: Solitaire (itch) (tsvetozar)
description:
Solitaire is the first game created with GameScript.js - my hobby project for creating a framework for HTML games using CANVAS and Web Audio API. I hope I'll be able to create more games and genres with it soon. Updates and improvements of the game will be posted as I progress with the development of GameScript.js

My GameScript.js corner: http://tsvetozar.com/gamescript

More hobby project from me: http://tsvetozar.com
